;;;92               case WM_NOTIFICATION_RELEASED:      /* React only if released */

;;;94                   GUI_EndDialog(hWin, 0);         /* End dialog with return value 0 if OK */

;;;108    */
;;;109    WM_HWIN MESSAGEBOX_Create(const char * sMessage, const char * sCaption, int Flags) {

;;;193    */
